value.name: Harding coating equipment
value.describe: The hard coating equipment is specially developed for plating super-hard films. It is suitable for molds, tools, knives and other industries to obtain a more wear-resistant and corrosion-resistant film on the surface and improve the use of tools. The service life of knife is increased by 3~10 times, and the service life of the mold is increased by 5~10 times.
value.scope:
Cutting tool industry (drills, cemented carbide, milling cutter heads, broaches, taps and gear cutters, etc.)

Precision mold industry (stamping molds, shearing molds, standard parts molds, forming molds, etc.)

Automobile industry (pistons, piston rings, alloy wheels, etc.)

Plastic processing: extrusion molding, injection molding

value.name: DLC coating equipment
value.describe:
DLC (Diamond Like Carbon Coating) coating equipment is widely used in engine parts, non-ferrous metal cutting tools, sliding seal parts, textile industry and other industrial fields.

This series of equipment is suitable for a variety of DLC coatings, and can be equipped with filtered arc ion plating, unbalanced magnetron sputtering, PE-CVD and other combinations according to customer needs. It is suitable for automobile parts manufacturing, mechanical parts, molds, bearings, punching Drawing dies, molds, aerospace parts, etc.

The “Interlayer Technology” DLC film developed by our company focuses on the intermediate layer to achieve good adhesion, wear resistance, high hardness, low friction coefficient, and low surface roughness, so that the DLC coating can obtain more superior performance. We successfully broke through the bottleneck of low-temperature film formation technology, allowing DLC coatings to develop in more fields.
value.scope:
Automobile industry: engine parts, brake components, transmission parts, chassis parts, alloy wheels, etc.

Mobile phone/watch industry: watch case, bracelet, dial, buttons, logo.

Mold industry: various molds such as stamping molds, powder metallurgy molds, semiconductor molds, etc.
